ingredients.item: 4 x 250g sirloin steaks, each about 2.5cm thick

instructions.step: Make the marinade: combine the mirin, mustard, sugar and saké (if using) in a shallow dish. Add the steaks, cover and marinate in the fridge for 3-4 hours.

Bring the steaks to room temperature before cooking. Using kitchen paper, wipe the marinade from each steak and brush with the sunflower oil. Sear on a hot barbecue or griddle pan for 3 minutes on each side for rare. Rest for 5 minutes.
Combine the mayonnaise and wasabi. Serve with the steaks and a salad.
Your best bet is a smooth, peppery shiraz. Yalumba Organic Shiraz 2010, South Australia.
